page.title: 09Calbourne Mothers & Children
page.content: As a{YOUNG MOTHER}living in Calbourne life is always busy. Activities available include a Mother and Toddler group, Womens Institute, Tennis, Cricket, Football and Snooker at the Recreation Centre. There is a Play area with swings, climbing frame and slide for the younger children. The {CHILDREN}also have Beetle Drives, Christmas parties and Discos. Calbourne School is now closed, so that all children travel by School bus. Primary children go to Shalfleet School 2 miles away the older childern travel 5 miles to Newport or 6 miles to Freshwater. The nearest Playschool for pre-school children is in Brighstone. Doctors, Dentists and Hospitals are at least 5 miles away but peripatetic health care is available if required.
